snippet: Wang Xiaoning served 10 years after being convicted of state subversion on evidence provided by the Internet giant Yahoo, which was criticized for helping Chinese authorities in the case.
abstract: Wang Xiaoning, Chinese dissident who served 10 years after being convicted of state subversion on evidence provided by the American Internet giant Yahoo, is released from prison in Beijing under sharp restrictions.
lead_paragraph: Wang Xiaoning served 10 years after being convicted of state subversion on evidence provided by the Internet giant Yahoo, which was criticized for helping Chinese authorities in the case.

headline.seo: Chinese Dissident in Yahoo Case Is Freed After 10 Years
headline.main: Chinese Dissident, Jailed on Evidence Provided by Yahoo, Is Freed
headline.print_headline: Chinese Dissident, Jailed on Evidence Provided by Yahoo, Is Freed

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
